metadata.title: CVE-2021-29983 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Firefox for Android could get stuck in fullscreen mode and not exit it even after normal interactions that should cause it to exit. *Note: This issue only affected Firefox for Android. Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 91.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
